name: Bologer VK Comments
author: Alexander Teshabaev

sections.description:
Bologer VK Comments adds comment widget from VK.com for posts and pages, with possibility to have it together with native WordPress comments or override them completely.
In together with customization options.

Major features in Bologer VK Comments include:

  • Completely override native WordPress comments
  • Set VK widget together with native WordPress comments. Set position of VK widget (over, under or below the header of the native comments)
  • Copy code from VK.com and paste into special field to auto fill most of the settings in widget
  • Fully customized settings of the widget directly from admin panel

Todo

0.0.3

  • Option: duplicate comments from VK widget to native WordPress comments
  • Option: load comments only when user scrolled to the comments section
  • reorganize structure of the widget (add tabs and more description for options) to make it easily customizable
  • Option: see number of comments for each post in the list of posts in the admin panel

0.0.2

  • Option: set custom space between header and widget when “Override” option is active
  • Option: set custom space before and after VK widget
  • Option: set custom header type, when “Override” option is active, as some of the themes use different type of h tag
sections.installation: Install and activate plugin, get widget code from VK developers page, enter it in the special field and press button to automatically set most of the settings for you.
